Room.Name: Hall of Heros
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Hall of Heros in Castle Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: On either side is a raised dais. A long line of enormous chairs sit side by side on each dais, and over each is a banner and a portrait. Black bunting covers an occasional picture, and a helmet and sword are in the chair there. To the east is the throne room. West leads to the courtyard.
